dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive Session Data Visualization Tools for CHW Supervision to the Last Mile Join these presenters to learn about how dynamic reports and data visualization tools are being used in two separate scaled programs You ll learn about techniques for designing tools and how improved data visualization can help improve health worker performance and health outcomes MedicMobile will present on their work with Muso to build and deploy dashboards that are used to provide feedback to community health workers CHWs Don t miss their updates on the impact of the dashboards as they discuss results from a recent to measure the impact of this intervention on CHWs performance Greenmash will also highlight their work of mobile technologies including the Mango Mobile platform to show how stakeholders can engage with programs in real time and at all levels This is a hands on interactive session so plan to come and fully engage and learn about data visualization and digital health from two leading organizations Presented by Sharon Langevin Mobile App Deployment Manager DIY Product Lead Medic Mobile
